pkgmetadata.longdescription: Categorical Marginal Models // Quite extensive package for maximum likelihood estimation and weighted least squares estimation of categorical marginal models (CMMs; e.g., Bergsma and Rudas, 2002, http://www.jstor.org/stable/2700006?; Bergsma, Croon and Hagenaars, 2009, DOI:10.1007/b12532.
